welcome_message_body: Welcome to Banning, a charming city in the heart of California known for its breathtaking views of the San Gorgonio Mountains and its rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Banning has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ryan Field Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ryan Field Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Thermal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Thermal Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norton AFB Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Norton AFB Airport is used for private and charter flights, with services such as fueling and maintenance available.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
